medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain with intermittent fevers and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports abdominal pain began nearly 1 week ago without clear aggravating factors and worsened over the past 24 hours. The pain worsened today, prompting ED evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: FNH, GERD, history of palpitations, anemia. Past surgical history includes laparoscopic left oophorectomy, hysterectomy, cholecystectomy, tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy, incision of lipomas, and appendectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of heart disease, otherwise non-contributory.
